resources.string: Allows the mobile app to use coarse location in order to check-in to places
Any links being opened from the mobile app will open from within the app instead of the browser
Force the use of the mobile or desktop site
Enable system logging. Useful when helping developer debug problems with the app

This app is for those users that require a Tinfoil Hat when logging in to Facebook. It creates a sandbox for facebook's mobile site to avoid them tracking your browsing history. Requires INTERNET permissions, and if you are skeptic about it, feel free to check the source code listed above. Coarse location permissions are required but location is not used unless you turn "Allow Check-ins" in the preferences.
